headline: Science Weekly podcast: the origin of life on Earth
text: Alok Jha is joined by Adam Rutherford to discuss how life began some 4bn years ago  and the manipulation of its blueprint, DNA, through genetic engineering. Adam's latest book, Creation: The Origin of Life/The Future of Life, is two books in one. The first details the latest research into how the first cellular life form emerged, and the second looks at the rapidly developing science of synthetic biology.
